conversation.message: Hello, I'm interested in purchasing an iPhone 14.
Hello! That's great to hear. We have various models and colors. Do you have a specific color or storage capacity in mind?
I'm looking for the 256GB model in black.
Perfect choice! We do have the black 256GB model in stock. Would you like to proceed with the purchase or do you have any questions?
How much is it going for?
The iPhone 14 with 256GB in black is priced at $1,099. We also have a special promotion right now where you get a free case with every purchase.
That seems a bit pricey. Do you have any ongoing discounts or offers?
I understand your concerns. Currently, we have an offer where if you trade in an old iPhone, you can get up to $200 off on the new one. Do you have an old iPhone to trade in?
Yes, I have an iPhone 12. How much discount would I get for that?
For an iPhone 12 in good condition, you'd get a $150 discount on your new purchase, bringing the total to $949.
Sounds good. What about the warranty?
The iPhone 14 comes with a one-year standard warranty from Apple. You can also purchase the AppleCare+ for an extended warranty and added benefits.
I've heard some complaints about the battery life. Has that issue been resolved?
Apple has made improvements to the battery performance in the iPhone 14. Most users report satisfactory battery life. However, individual experiences may vary based on usage.
Okay, I'll think about it and come back later.
Of course, take your time. If you have any further questions or decide to purchase, just let us know. We're here to help!
One last question, do you offer any financing options?
Yes, we do have financing options available. You can choose to pay in monthly installments with 0% interest for 12 months.
That sounds good. I'll definitely consider it. Thanks for the information.
You're welcome! If you need anything else, just reach out. Have a great day!
